function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher risk of exposure to unhealthy and symptomless persons suffering from COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting and transmitting the virus to family members","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, regular testing, and use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purifiers, UV disinfection systems","People":"Field workers, workers with family members at home","Owner":"Employers, health and safety authorities"},{"Description":"Loneliness epidemic due to lack of person-to-person contact for field workers","Impact":"Mental health issues, decreased productivity, increased social isolation","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, establish virtual communication channels, organize regular check-ins and social activities","Technologies":"Virtual communication platforms, telehealth services, mental health apps","People":"Field workers, employers","Owner":"Employers, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Anxiety, depression, and suicide risk due to isolation for remote workers","Impact":"Mental health issues, decreased productivity, increased risk of suicide","Mitigation":"Promote work-life balance, provide mental health resources, encourage social interaction","Technologies":"Virtual team-building tools, mental health apps, telemedicine services","People":"Remote workers, employers","Owner":"Employers"}]}
